    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        The main function for the class Alice. Sets up the variables and keys to be used in the program Creates a connection to Bob or requests a new port number if connection fails Calls AuthenticateCommunication() to authenticate the communication with Bob using the AuthenticationServer If authenticated starts the messaging.
        Parameters:
        args - String array to take input into the main method
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws exception in Alice main

      • Connect

        private static java.net.Socket Connect​(int portConnectionNumber)
        Method to connect a socket with the port specified in parameters
        Parameters:
        portConnectionNumber - The port number the socket will connect through
        Returns:
        returns The connected socket or null if no connection made

      • getCAPublicKey

        private static void getCAPublicKey()
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the Certificate of Public Key
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception in getCAPublicKey

      • signCertificate

        private static byte[] signCertificate​(byte[] certificate)
        Method to generate a certificate from the Authentication server
        Parameters:
        certificate - the public key
        Returns:
        Signed Hash of the public key

      • getPublicKey

        private static boolean getPublicKey​(byte[] cert,
                                    byte[] hashString)
                             throws java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException,
                                    java.security.NoSuchProviderException,
                                    java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Method to verify that the connection is to bob. Decrypts the string with the CA public key and makes sure that it says bob who we are trying to talk to.
        Parameters:
        cert - The encoded String that is signed by the CA with their private key
        hashString - The hashString is the encrypted hash from the CA
        Returns:
        true if the certificate is validated.
        Throws:
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - Throws an invalid key spec exception in getPublicKey
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Throws a no such algorithm exception in getPublicKey
        java.security.NoSuchProviderException - Throws a no such provider exception in getPublicKey

      • RequestCommunication

        private static boolean RequestCommunication​(java.io.DataInputStream inBob,
                                            java.io.DataOutputStream outBob)
        Executes the authentication steps with the KDC using master keys and nonces to authenticate the communication session between Alice and Bob and generate a session key. As well as validate that the conversation is indeed between Alice and Bob.
        Parameters:
        inBob - Reads in input stream from Bob
        outBob - Sends out datastream to Bob
        Returns:
        true if the authentication is validated

      • startMessaging

        private static void startMessaging​(java.net.Socket socket,
                                   java.io.DataInputStream in,
                                   java.io.DataOutputStream out)
        Passes the socket for the communication with Bob. This method will only be called once the communication session has been authenticated.
        Parameters:
        socket - The socket connected to Bob
        in - Takes in the data stream
        out - Outputs messaging data
